text: The reddish-gray mouse lemur (Microcebus griseorufus) is a type of lemur. It is called the gray-brown mouse lemur or rufous-gray mouse lemur. It is found in Western Madagascar in the region around Beza Mahafaly Reserve, north to Lamboharana. ==References== Category:Lemuriformes Category:Mammals of Africa
title: Reddish-gray mouse lemur
